'''Sean Francis Bobbitt''' (born 29 November 1958) is an American cinematographer who served as director of photography for the [[Season 1|first season]] of ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]''.

He has worked on films such as ''The Place Beyond the Pines'' and ''12 Years a Slave''.
